comments:
Running Eclipse 20020109 with latest plugins as of 1/14/02, my java outliner
stopped working. I received no error dialog and closing the outliner and
reopening it *didn't* fix the problem. I had to completely restart Eclipse
before the outliner started responding again.

I found the following stack trace in my log:

Just to clarify, the outliner stopped working but eclipse itself was still 
alive, i.e., you could type into the editor?

Just want to make sure that the symptoms are not the same as in 7211
That's correct. The rest of Eclipse was still responsive.

The walkback looks related to the problem, since it happens in the outliner  
when activting a page in the outliner's pagebook. 

Any hints of what you did before the walkback would be helpful. The walkback 
started from opening a file.

Moving to Platform UI for investigation.

This problem continues to occur frequently.

I've started occasionally receiving an internal error dialog now (the stack
trace is identical to the one I've posted here).

It seems to happen when I do "Open On Type"

I thought this felt familier.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 4228 ***
